Package org.opt4j.core.problem

Interface Decoder<G extends Genotype,​P>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - the type of genotype that is decoded
    P - the type of the resulting phenotype}
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSATDecoder, BinaryCopyDecoder, BinaryToDoubleDecoder, DoubleCopyDecoder, HelloWorldDecoder, KnapsackBinaryCreatorDecoder, KnapsackSATCreatorDecoder, LOTZDecoder, MinOnesDecoder, QueensCopyDecoder, QueensPermutationDecoder, QueensSATDecoder, SalesmanDecoder
    public interface Decoder<G extends Genotype,​P>
    The Decoder decodes Genotypes into phenotype Objects.
